this copyright does not cover the so called standalone applications that use u boot services by means of the jump table provided by u boot exactly for this purpose   this is merely considered normal use of u boot and does not fall under the heading of derived work
the header files include imageh and include asm  u booth define interfaces to u boot
including these unmodified header files in another file is considered normal use of u boot and does not fall under the heading of derived work
